targets.rawSql:
-- https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43527730/postgres-count-instances-and-put-in-buckets
WITH buckets as (
  SELECT (CASE WHEN cnt <= 2 THEN '<= 2'
             WHEN cnt <= 4 THEN '<= 4'
             WHEN cnt <= 8 THEN '<= 8'
             WHEN cnt <= 16 THEN '<= 16'
             ELSE '16+'
        END) as bucket, COUNT(*) as n
  FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON(peer) NULLIF(value, '')::int as cnt
     FROM properties
     WHERE name = 'process.runtime.numcpu'
   ) l
   GROUP BY bucket
   ORDER BY MIN(cnt)
 ) SELECT bucket "Cores", (n / (SELECT SUM(n) FROM buckets)) "Total"
 FROM buckets;

-- https://stackoverflow.com/questions/14020919/find-difference-between-timestamps-in-seconds-in-postgresql
WITH durations  AS (
  SELECT sessions.session "session", (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM sessions.last_seen) - NULLIF(properties.value, '')::int) "dur"
  FROM sessions
  INNER JOIN properties ON sessions.session = properties.session
  WHERE properties.name = 'process.boottime'
)
SELECT session, MAX(dur) "dur" FROM durations GROUP BY session;
